author: ruchithf
msg: Fixed maven.xml to obtain the maven.test.skip value correctly

author: dain
msg: New test case to show off the simpler kernel methods.

author: aramirez
msg: If there are no "subpackages" defined, the plugin still uses the @files

author: crossley
msg: Fix incorrect sense of longitudes: +ve for East, -ve for West

author: wsmoak
msg: Added Cargo integration to the Use Cases example.
To use Cargo to run the integration tests, you will need to:
* execute 'ant download-dependencies' to retrieve the Cargo jars
* set the new properties 'tomcat55.home' and 'tomcat50.home' in build.properties
